Tier 0: Automated Responses.Example: Thanks for contacting Relay! Your ticket #12345 is confirmed. We'll respond within [SLA].

Tier 1: FAQ Matching.Chatbot Action: Auto-match FAQ + KB articles to ticket
Tier 1: FAQ Matching.Example: Ticket mentions 'invoice not sending' → Link: 'Why didn't my invoice send?' + troubleshooting
Tier 1: FAQ Matching.Escalation: If no match found, escalate to human

Tier 2: Knowledge Base Search.Chatbot Action: Search KB for answer, suggest to customer
Tier 2: Knowledge Base Search.Example: We found an article that might help: 'How to resend invoice' - Yes / No / Need more help
Tier 2: Knowledge Base Search.Escalation: If customer selects 'Need more help', escalate

Tier 3: AI Resolution Bot.Chatbot Action: Use AI (Fin, Answer Bot) to provide comprehensive answer
Tier 3: AI Resolution Bot.Example: Based on your question about SMS reminders: [AI generates detailed answer]
Tier 3: AI Resolution Bot.Escalation: If AI unsure, escalate with context to human

Tier 4: Human Escalation.Trigger: After 3 failed attempts or complex issue
Tier 4: Human Escalation.Human Action: Full context + chat history provided, agent takes over
